title: Number Plate Detection
short: End-to-end ANPR system: plate localization, OCR, and country-format parsing; robust to angle/lighting.

title: Image Generator
short: Generative model that creates high-quality images from textual prompts and style inputs.

title: Voice Translator
short: Real-time speech-to-speech translator: ASR -> translation -> TTS pipeline with low latency.

title: Fake Login Page Detection
short: Browser-extension/back-end service that analyzes page structure and content to flag phishing/fake login pages.

title: Theft Detection Using Database
short: Multi-modal theft-detection system combining CCTV analytics and inventory DB reconciliation to flag anomalies.
